events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit me well.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Alex has been assigned to handle the refund request case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket order. I am here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the reason why you want to return the item?
Sure, my order number is 567890. The jacket is too small, and I would like to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 30 days. We will issue a full refund once we receive the returned item.
That sounds great, thank you for your help. I will send the jacket back today using the prepaid shipping label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect.
Just checking in to make sure your refund was received and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
This case is now closed since the refund was successfully issued and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
